mapper.select: SELECT ss2.SCH_SEQ , ss2.STORE_SEQ , ss2.CATEGORY_NAME , ss2.STORE_NAME , ss2.ADDRESS_NAME , ss2.ROAD_ADDRESS_NAME , ss2.ADDRESS_DETAIL , ss2.LNG , ss2.LAT , ss2.FRST_WRT_DTIM , ss2.LAST_CHNG_DTIM FROM SMI_SCHE ss INNER JOIN SCH_STORE ss2 WHERE ss.SMI_SEQ = 1 AND ss.SCH_SEQ = ss2.SCH_SEQ AND LAT BETWEEN #{bfLat} AND #{afLat} AND LNG BETWEEN #{bfLng} AND #{afLng}
